snippet: More than 99 percent of the schools still have housing, and all of them are still offering financial aid, according to the National Association for College Admission Counseling.
abstract: More than 99 percent of the schools still have housing, and all of them are still offering financial aid, according to the National Association for College Admission Counseling.

headline.main: More Than 200 Colleges Are Still Taking Applications for Fall 2013
